ENTRY.SYNOPSIS: Equilibrium ionization collisional plasma model from Borkowski. XSpec model.

DESC.PARA: Ionization equilibrium collisional plasma model. This is the equilibrium version of Kazik Borkowski's NEI models.
This is an additive model component.

ROW.DATA: metal abundances (He fixed at cosmic). The elements included are C, N, O, Ne, Mg, Si, S, Ca, Fe, Ni. Abundances are set by the set_xsabund command.
10^-14 / (4 pi (D_A*(1+z))^2) Int n_e n_H dV, where D_A is the angular size distance to the source (cm), n_e is the electron density (cm^-3), and n_H is the hydrogen density (cm^-3)

DESC.PARA: The references for this model are:

LIST.ITEM: Hamilton, A.J.S., Sarazin, C. L. & Chevalier, R. A. , 1983, ApJS, 51, 115
Borkowski, K.J., Sarazin, C.L. & Blondin, J.M. 1994, ApJ, 429, 710
Liedahl, D.A., Osterheld, A.L. & Goldstein, W.H. 1995, ApJ, 438, L115

DESC.PARA: This information is taken from the XSpec User's Guide. Version 12.7.1 of the XSpec models is supplied with CIAO 4.4.1.
